CONTROLLER_START_ADDRESS_GENERIC
[CONTROLLER]


Classes

class  INSTLIB::CONTROL_START_ADDRESS_GENERIC

Functions

INT32 INSTLIB::CONTROL_START_ADDRESS_GENERIC::CheckKnobs (CONTROL_HANDLER ch, VOID *val)

Detailed Description

Generic controller for detecting the start of an interval using an address or symbol and a count, etc. This takes a generic event, knob and knob usage string.

Function Documentation

VOID *  val 
) [inline, inherited]

Activate the controller if the -start_address knob is provided

Returns:
1 if controller can start an interval, otherwise 0
